text: @bbcnickrobinson @BBCr4today This is what passes for 'journalism' in the BBC! Both father and son flouted the guidelines to keep them and everyone else safe. Johnson, the liar, got COVID19 through his own hubris and we, mere plebs, are expected to celebrate both the 'lesson' of his illness and his recovery! https://t.co/dhvDgB5psk
